Posts.Content: I'm luck to live in a big metropolitan area. It has taken a while, but I now have all my docs at one medical center/hospital, where everything is on their computer and they can all get what they want despite my increasing confusion. I also pay for Medicare Plan F, which is the most expensive Medicare supplemental plan, but I (almost) never get a bill. I have a very limited income, but these are important steps for me.
Posts.Title: Mastering your medical paperwork: Tips from a professional organizer
